ygData.subject: New quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the new quests have been a topic of much debate as of late. What are your opinions, experiences, and rants about the new quests? I recently gained the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the new quests have been a topic of much
debate as of late. What are your opinions, experiences,
and rants about the new quests? I recently gained the
Boots of the Reliant with a level 15 cleric. It was
broing as hell waiting for the items to spawn, and the
item isn't that great (Stats of plate with +1 AC and
+6 against poison) However, it did feel pretty good
to do it all on my own, with an lower leel character
too! Also, the armor is golden plate and looks very
cool ;) So, the wuest and items themselves (For
clerics, most other classes don't have it quite so bad)
were dissapointing, but the satisfaction and looks
were good.<br><br>Let everyone know your opinions!
